instruction: Hypothyroidism: Palpitations have been less frequent since adjusting the levothyroxine dose, but the patient still experiences them sometimes.

attributes.background: The patient has been experiencing less frequent palpitations since the levothyroxine dose was adjusted, indicating a possible link between the hypothyroidism treatment and the palpitations.
attributes.narrative: The patient still experiences palpitations sometimes, despite the adjustment in levothyroxine dosage.

instruction: Set up a delivery service for the patient's medication to help with transportation issues.

attributes.comment: Assist the patient with transportation issues by arranging a delivery service for their medication.
attributes.title: Set up medication delivery service
